title: AI Insights
noDataDescriptionWithFilters: Select a date range and click 'Generate Report' to create AI-powered insights for your production data.
noDataDescriptionNoFilters: Please select a date range first, then click 'Generate Report' to create AI-powered insights.
selectDateRangeError: Please select both start and end dates before generating the report.
errorGeneratingInsights: An error occurred while generating insights.
canGenerateNewReport: You can now generate a new AI insights report.
exportSuccess: AI insights report has been downloaded as CSV file.
rateLimitMessage: AI insights can only be generated once every 30 minutes. Please wait {{time}} before generating a new report. Your current report will remain available until the timer expires. To keep these insights permanently, please use the Export button to download them as a CSV file, as AI generated reports are not saved long-term.
